CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( APT_Domestic_Overweight_Flag__c = TRUE, APT_Dangerous_Goods_Flag__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c, ''), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_QPApprov__Approval_Status__c , 'Pending Approval')), NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalContextSubmit?sObjectType=Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c&sObjectId="&Id&"&enableAttachments=true", IMAGE("/resource/APT_Submit_Oversize_and_Dangerous_Goods_for_Approval", "Submit Oversize and Dangerous Goods for Approval"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Button won't be available if pricing approvals are pending.
CustomField.label: Submit Overweight & DG Approval
